Ogden.Stewart Stadium:
Elizabeth Dee Shaw Stewart Stadium is an outdoor multi-purpose stadium in the western United States, located on the campus of Weber State University in Ogden, Utah. Formerly known as Wildcat Stadium, it was renamed in 1998 for Stewart (1905–1996), a notable campus and community benefactor.
Used primarily for football, the 17,312-seat venue is the home of the Weber State Wildcats of the Big Sky Conference.
